languages.original_text: To determine the trajectory of shots, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. The base chance to direct shots along the central trajectory is (30 + Ballistic Skill)% — this value cannot be lower than 30% nor higher than 95%. There is also a chance that the shot will deviate by 1 cell and go on a different but adjacent trajectory — the chance is equal to (70 − Ballistic Skill)%. If a character fires a burst at a distance beyond the effective {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of the weapon, the chance of firing along the central trajectory is halved. At the same time, the number of possible trajectories doubles, expanding the cone of fire with shots having a chance to deviate by up to 2 cells. Lastly, a shot, initially fired along the central trajectory, now has a chance to deviate by 1 cell. If the shot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} on any of the trajectories, characters can try to avoid the attack. Partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack and full cover increases it to 60%. This chance may vary depending on the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, as well as any positive or {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If cover fails, the target will attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. In the case of burst attacks, critical hit chance is calculated separately for each shot. Each shot from a burst attack is subject to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g}.

languages.original_text: To determine the trajectory of shots, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. languages.text: Para determinar la trayectoria de los disparos se utiliza la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del personaje. languages.text: To determine the trajectory of shots, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. The target will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to take cover or dodge the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack. When shooting along the central trajectory, even for bursts, for every additional 1% chance to hit above 95%, the chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} increases by 1%. In the case of burst attacks, critical hit chance is calculated separately for each shot. Each shot from a burst attack is subject to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g}.
